caption.p: Therapeutic potential of taro phytochemicals: Anti-carcinogenic effects of taro bioactive compounds on the non-canonical NF-κB pathway could be mediated by polyphenols. Polyphenols can mediate the suppression of NF-κB transcriptional factor resulting in the inhibition of pro-inflammatory signaling cascade, apoptosis induction, cell proliferation control, and metastasis. inhibitory kappa B kinase (IKK); vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF); B-cell lymphoma 2 (BCL-2); B-cell lymphoma X (BCL-X); c-myelocytomatosis (C-MYC).
